issue.title: [C++] Detect unauthorized memory allocations in function kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9285](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9285). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a function has been configured to preallocate space, then executing the kernel should not replace the preallocated buffer during execution – this is an implementation error. Detecting this would be relatively easy and improve debugging for kernel implementers
